## SendableMoneyp.depositCollateral() method

Adjust existing Vault by depositing more collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
depositCollateral(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentMoneypTransaction<S, MoneypReceipt<R, VaultAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of collateral to add to the Vault's existing collateral. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.sentmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MoneypReceipt](./lib-base.moneypreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [VaultAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustVault({ depositCollateral: amount })

```
